PharMEDium Experience Theater
2017

Touch-screen interactive for prospecitive clients that includes a three scren simultaneous video display.

Built prototype from HTML/CSS, JQuery, Node and with Gulp.

Headed installation of hardware and software onsite including continued maintenance and updates.

Museum of the Bible Washington, DC
2018

Touch-screen interactive where each screen (5 total) gives the user the option to learn about one of two human rights leaders. Project included video and video progress tooltips.

Built prototype from HTML/CSS, JQuery, Node and with Gulp.

Finished product was created using Create React App.

Museum of the Bible Washington, DC
2018

Touch-screen interactive that included video and video progress tooltips. Finished product was created using Create React App.

The Teagle Foundation
2016

Was part of the small 3 person team that built and launched The Teagle Foundation website. My first project with C&G Partners LLC as a baby developer. Helped mainly with QA of the site and the fixes that resulted. All frontend with an emphasis on pixel perfect CSS adjustments and animations.
